channel.title: playtwirl on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in playtwirl on Ross A. Baker

item.description: http4s-twirl releases are out, courtesy of Kailuo Wang: * 0.23.17 makes the jump from scala-xml-1 to scala-xml-2. Beware, binary breaking! * 0.24.0-M1 is based on twirl-1.6 milestones for Scala 3 support. Server-side templates are cool again. #http4s #Typelevel #PlayTwirl
